PluginCommandHelpMessage:
显示Visbility插件设置.
输入'/pvis help'获得额外帮助
VoidPlayerHelpMessage:
添加角色到黑名单.
用法: /void <firstname> <lastname> <worldname> <reason>
VoidTargetPlayerHelpMessage:
将目标玩家添加到黑名单.
用法: /voidtarget <reason>
WhitelistPlayerHelpMessage:
添加角色到白名单.
用法: /void <firstname> <lastname> <worldname>
WhitelistTargetPlayerHelpMessage:
添加目标角色到白名单.
用法: /whitelisttarget
PluginCommandHelpMenu3: /pvis <setting> <on/off/toggle> - 打开/关闭/切换特定设置
OptionEarthlyStar: 隐藏非小队成员的地星
OptionEarthlyStarTip: 隐藏非小队成员的地星(仅在战斗中生效)
OptionContextMenuTip: 在聊天框中启用右键菜单(右键单击任意角色的角色名)
OptionShowTargetOfTargetTip: Disables hiding the target of your current target if it is hidden by your settings (Does not affect voided targets)
